para.text: There is established a Home Visiting Program ("Program"), which shall be administered by DOH in accordance with this section.
Subject to appropriations, the Program shall be funded from the following sources:
In Fiscal Year 2019, an amount of $710,566 in local funds;
In Fiscal Year 2020, an amount of $2 million in local funds;
The funds in the Program shall be used to support the provision of home visiting services and home visit system activities.
